Reviews.Title: Awesomest phone ever
Reviews.Author: dejavu
Reviews.Content: This phone rocks, everything you need without the fear of getting creamed by your service provider these days who charge you a ransom for internet browsing and downloads.....let me list a few benefits....FREE maps and music download.....FREE software from ovi store.....and lots more to sit and type.....and the phone itself is all metal solid feel.....enjoy.edit date 4/11/2012 -- Have been using this phone for over 6 months now and still i am amazed by finding new things in the phone, the free software from Nokia from ovi store just make it wonderful. The gorilla glass display is just what i wanted, my two year old watches videos on it all the time, has dropped it couple of times but not a single scratch....you have to experience it to believe it....... have been comparing to android phones lately and the i phone......i tell you this is the way to go.....have not been forced to sign up for any data plan or pay some stupid service tax fees to these blood sucking telephone companies. The phone itself is amazing more so after the free belle upgrade from Nokia, they know how to make customers happy.

Reviews.Title: Nokia X7
Reviews.Author: Carczar
Reviews.Content: I had read many reveiws for the X7 after doing an online search. Many reveiwers spoke desparagingly about the processor, lack of apps in the ovi store and the view that symbianv3 was not on par with ios and andriod. I have been using the device for about a month and the processor performs just fine IMO. As for the ovi store, I personaly am not interested in downloading 10,000 apps that I am no longer going to use once the novelty wears off. The two Nokia's I have owned thus far I much preferred to the Blackberries I have had in the past. As for symbianv3, it preforms no worse than any other os I have used (better then some). I was looking for a device with the best antennea in the market (this is Nokia). X7 also has very good sat/nav, locks onto satellites faster than any device I have ever used. If you are in the market (as I was) for a device with the best antennea and sat/nav on the market you can't go wrong with the X7 or any Nokia for that matter.

Reviews.Title: Troubling transaction...
Reviews.Author: PM
Reviews.Content: This was not a pleasant 'Sold by the oem shop... Fulfilled by amazon' transaction. It left me querying both quality control criteria and procedures; however, the amazon representative handled the matter in a stellar fashion...kudos!At-a-glance:-The Nokia X7 was ordered, received (black steel color), and NOT new as listed-Sent emails (unanswered) to vendor (dictated by protocol since it was sold by the oem shop)-Received model X7-00.1/RM-659/059J7V2 as refurbished in opened OEM box w/rogers recycle bag-Exterior OEM label was covered w/another label: "Nokia X7 Unlocked 3G...Version w/No Warranty"-Device will only work on WCDMA 850/1900/2100 MHz (Not a pentaband like the X7-00/RM-707)-Opened box had only device, 8GB microsd, quick start guide, micro-usb cable, and charger (US)-Premium nokia headset (WH-701), along with the extra earbuds, were not included in nokia box-Housing was scuffed/dirty with sim cover not inserted and wouldn't power up due to dead battery

Reviews.Title: Good Phone Nokia won't service it though
Reviews.Author: JPD
Reviews.Content: I've been a Nokia fan for a long time.  Now that Nokia does not sell phonbes in the US anymore, except from authorized dealers like Amazon ( according to their own US Website), they will refuse to service them.This is a very good phone, problem is Nokia decided to place the SIM card card and micro SD card in two tiny little trays.  And if you frop and lose one, or break one, you can not get a replacaement, AT ALL. I have been going back and forth with them for a week now, they even offered to replace the phone with a different model, but can't guarantee it will be brand new.Botrtom line, be careful when buying Nokia, and make sure it was released in the US.  Most Nokia phones on Amazon, and other sites are imports you are SOL foro any kind of service. For a once well respected, and giant in the industry, it's market share has plummeted and their customer service is only pulling them down faster.
